titles.title: Sustainable Ecosystems and Economies (SEE) Demonstration Act of 1994
A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to establish and carry out a Sustainable Ecosystems and Economies Demonstration Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S11479-11480)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.

bill.summary: 8/12/1994--Introduced. Sustainable Ecosystems and Economies (SEE) Demonstration Act of 1994 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to establish and implement in the Forest Service a Sustainable Ecosystems and Economies (SEE) Demonstration Program (Program) to investigate and demonstrate new management strategies to: (1) ensure sustainable ecosystems; and (2) provide technical and economic assistance to forest resource-dependent communities. Directs the Secretary to designate ecosystem management areas. Establishes in the Treasury a Sustainable Ecosystems and Economies Account. Directs the President to submit an annual Program report to the Congress.
